posts.title: Petrol, diesel prices today: Petrol gets cheaper in Delhi on 02 December, fuel rates unchanged in rest of India
posts.desc: Petrol and diesel prices on 01 December 2021: Petrol price in Delhi stands at Rs 95.41 per litre while diesel is available for Rs 86.67. In Mumbai, petrol is retailing at Rs 109.98 while diesel costs Rs 94.14

posts.title: Gold price today: 10 grams of 24-carat gold at Rs 48,120; silver touches Rs 60,700 per kg
posts.desc: Gold futures fell by 0.19 percent to Rs 47,780 and silver futures declined by 0.05 percent to Rs 61.247, according to Multi Commodity Exchange data

posts.title: Rupee slips 16 paise to 75.07 against US dollar in early trade
posts.desc: The rupee has been under pressure over the last few trading sessions, as investor concern has resurfaced about how much damage the new Omicron coronavirus variant may unleash on the economy

posts.title: Satya Nadella dumps 50% of Microsoft shares in multiple tranches ahead of capital gains tax change
posts.desc: The Microsoft CEO offloaded about 840,000 shares for over $285 million, according to a filing with the US Securities and Exchange Commission.

posts.title: Market Roundup: Sensex falls by 764 points, Nifty ends at 17,196; today's top winners and losers
posts.desc: India VIX rose by 2.03 percent to 18.46 levels, while smallcap indices also ended in green. BSE Midcap registered a marginal loss of 0.01 percent to settle at 25,182.91

posts.title: Rupee falls 14 paise to 75.16 against US dollar amid growing worries over new COVID-19 variant
posts.desc: The rupee has been under pressure over the last few trading sessions as the detection of the new coronavirus variant Omicron re-ignited growth concerns and hurt risk appetite.

posts.title: Gold price today: 10 grams of 24-carat gold sold at Rs 47,080; silver reaches Rs 61,200 per kg
posts.desc: The value of 10 grams of 22-carat gold in New Delhi is Rs 46,250 and in Mumbai, 22-carat gold for the same quantity is being purchased at Rs 46,080 today on 03 December 2021

posts.title: In surprise move, Gita Gopinath to take on new role at IMF as First Deputy Managing Director
posts.desc: Gopinath, who was the first woman to serve as the IMFâ€™s chief economist, had said in October she planned to rejoin Harvard University in January

posts.title: How reforms are imperative for strengthening the growing basket of high value agriculture
posts.desc: Implementation of policy reforms has always been tough. Prudence lies in drawing lessons from what has worked well and the challenges that need to be addressed rather than discarding reforms

posts.title: Petrol, diesel prices today: Rates unchanged on 03 December, check here what you need to pay in your city
posts.desc: Petrol and diesel prices on 03 December 2021: Petrol price in Delhi stands at Rs 95.41 per litre while diesel is available for Rs 86.67. In Mumbai, petrol is retailing at Rs 109.98 while diesel costs Rs 94.14

posts.title: Market Roundup : Sensex rises by 776 points, Nifty ends at 17,401; check top winners and losers here
posts.desc: In terms of sectoral indices, bank, auto, metal, media and pharma were in the green. Broader markets mirrored benchmark indices. BSE Smallcap rose 1.12 percent to end at 28,327.64 while BSE Midcap ended 1.01 percent higher at 25,186.16

posts.title: Sovereign Gold Bond Scheme available via RBI's retail direct portal; check details here
posts.desc: Those interested can buy Sovereign Gold Bonds through various methods, including digitally. To buy the bonds online, investors can apply through the official websites of the listed scheduled commercial banks

posts.title: US giant Enron filed for bankruptcy 20 years ago: Collapse that ruined lives, revealed dark side of business
posts.desc: The fall of Enron, then ranked as the seventh-largest company in the United States, affected thousands of employees and shook Wall Street to its core

posts.title: Market Roundup : Sensex rises by 619 points, Nifty ends at 17,166; check top winners and losers here
posts.desc: In terms of sectoral indices, expect pharma and consumer durables, all sectors ended in green. BSE midcap rose by 1.00 percent to 24,934.68 and BSE Smallcap ended 0.27 percent higher at 28,013.77

posts.title: Petrol price in Delhi to get cheaper by Rs 8 per litre as govt slashes VAT to 19.40%
posts.desc: The decision was taken in a meeting of the Delhi cabinet chaired by Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal on Wednesday

posts.title: Banks to remain shut for 12 days in December; check complete list here
posts.desc: People should note that many of these holidays are state-wise holidays, meaning that banks will remain closed in only certain parts of the country

posts.title: Paytm expects revenue, monetisation methods to expand in next few quarters: CEO
posts.desc: Paytm had posted a loss of Rs 436.7 crore in the same quarter a year ago, according to an exchange filing

posts.title: Tega Industries IPO fully subscribed within one hour on Day 1 of bidding; all you need to know
posts.desc: The Rs 619.22-crore IPO received bids for 1,01,82,315 shares against 95,68,636 shares on offer, translating into 1.06 times subscription, according to NSE data.

posts.title: Go Fashion shares skyrocket on market debut; check details here
posts.desc: The company will use the net proceeds (from fresh issue) for rolling out over 100 exclusive brand outlets and meeting working capital requirements

posts.title: Rupee surges 29 paise to 74.84 against US dollar in early trade
